body: enable : BOOL;   //  TRUE: Enable functionality of FB
valid : BOOL;   //  TRUE: Valid set of output values available at the FB
busy : BOOL;   //  TRUE: FB is not finished and new output values can be expected
commandAborted : BOOL;   //  TRUE: Commanded functionality has been aborted by another command  (optional)
error : BOOL;   //  TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB
status : WORD := STATUS_NO_CALL;   //  WORD#16#0000 - WORD#16#7FFF: Status of the FB, WORD#16#8000 - WORD#16#FFFF: Error identification
diagnostics : Diagnostics;   //  Diagnostics information of FB (optional)
_enableOld : BOOL;   //  Old value of 'enable' input for edge detection
_errorUserCleared : BOOL;   //  Error occurred that can only be solved by user; rising edge at enable input necessary
_errorAutoCleared : BOOL;   //  Error occurred that can be acknowledged by FB
_status : WORD := STATUS_NO_CALL;   //  Static value for output 'status'
_subfunctionStatus : WORD;   //  Status or return value of called FBs, FCs and system blocks
_fbErrorState : DINT;   //  State in the state machine of the block where the error occurred
_fbState : FbStates;   //  State in the state machine of the FB
_disablingCompleted : BOOL;   //  TRUE: Disabling has been completed
_emptyDiagnostics : Diagnostics;   //  Empty diagnostics information (for initialization purposes only)
tempEnable : BOOL;   //  Temporary value for input 'enable'
STATUS_NO_CALL : WORD := WORD#16#7000;   //  No job being currently processed
STATUS_FIRST_CALL : WORD := WORD#16#7001;   //  First call after incoming new job (rising edge 'enable')
STATUS_SUBSEQUENT_CALL : WORD := WORD#16#7002;   //  Subsequent call during active processing without further details
STATUS_COMMAND_ABORTED : WORD := WORD#16#7FFF;   //  Commanded functionality has been aborted by another command
SUB_STATUS_NO_ERROR : WORD := WORD#16#0000;   //  NO error occured in subfunction call
ERR_UNDEFINED_STATE : WORD := WORD#16#8600;   //  Error: due to an undefined state in state machine
ERR_IN_BLOCK_OPERATION : WORD := WORD#16#8001;   //  Error: Wrong operation of the function block
ERR_PARAMETRIZATION : WORD := WORD#16#8200;   //  Error: during parameterization
ERR_PROCESSING_EXTERN : WORD := WORD#16#8400;   //  Error: when processing from outside (e. g. wrong I/O signals, axis not referenced)
ERR_PROCESSING_INTERN : WORD := WORD#16#8600;   //  Error: when processing internally (e. g. when calling a system function)
ERR_AREA_RESERVED : WORD := WORD#16#8800;   //  Error: Reserved area
ERR_USER_DEFINED_CLASSES : WORD := WORD#16#9000;   //  Error: User-defined error classes
